cards.title: Design Decision: MkDirs vs VH Refactor
cards.goal: Pick the path forward for professional-looking directory sites

checklist.text: Reviewed MkDirs features ($79, Next.js + Shadcn + Sanity)
Compared to refactoring VH (free but 2-3 weeks work)
